content.content: Forum Navigation Index This thread lists the most commonly-used tags for all categories. Adding an appropriate tag when creating a new post makes governance more efficient.   Updates maker-relay - Your weekly general update on MakerDAO mips-update - Your weekly update on Maker Improvement Proposals forum-at-a-glance - Your weekly update on what’s happening in the forum rates-working-group - Proposals by the the Parameter Proposal Group blog - New blog posts operational-support - Updates from Operational Support Summary - Summaries of information  Governance informal-poll - Informal Polls sourcecred - All topics regarding the governance incentive program, SourceCred  Signal Requests signaling - Signal Requests sig-status-active - Signal Requests that are ongoing in the forum sig-status-pending - Signal Requests that have ended in the forum and are awaiting an on-chain poll OR they have been postponed for external reasons sig-status-onchain - Signal Requests that are actively voted upon in an on-chain poll sig-status-accepted - Signal Requests that have been accepted and archived sig-status-rejected - Signal Requests that have been rejected and archived  Core Units core-unit-tools - Calls providing tools for operating a Core Unit culps - Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions which help you get to know proposed Core Units core-unit-rituals - Calls providing best-practice organization and procedures for Core Units rwf-001 - Updates from the Real-World Finance Core Unit  Collateral Onboarding collateral-call - Dates, videos, resources on Collateral Calls collateral-app - MIP6 Collateral Onboarding Applications  Domain Work risk-domain-work - Risk domain work as it relates to collateral onboarding real-world-finance - Real-World Finance domain work as it relates to collateral onboarding oracle-domain-work - Oracle domain work as it relates to collateral onboarding  Maker Improvement Proposals core-unit - All MIPs relating to the Core Unit framework  Latin America español - All threads in Spanish  Other data - Threads relating to data analysis dsr - Threads relating to the Dai Savings Rate debt-ceiling - Threads relating to Debt Ceilings meta-governance Threads with a bird’s eye view on governance idea - Threads with ideas relating to MakerDAO  Last updated: 05/05/21, Elihu  A full list of tags is here.
Thx. This is great. I would also like to compliment your work in general it is unbelievably high quality every time. Imo the community will benefit greatly from your efforts. Thx again.

In the spirit of experimentation / laziness, I’ve made this index a wiki-post. That means that anyone TL1 or above can edit it. If anyone wants to update the top tags, or move these into categories or generally improve layout or navigation for this index, feel free to take a crack at it.

Updated by moving the tags into categories and adding a few of the more recently used ones. Some may say that if we have categories and we have tags, then we don’t need categories for our tags. To those people, I say: This is a wiki post.

@LongForWisdom I think soon we will need to have a thread that collects all the MIP ideas before they actually happen. For example, I know there’s community discussions about a number of things that will be needing to happen in our governance roadmap. For example:  MKR locked for t time during voting, to prevent from atomic vote+sale to escape liability. This would also ensure the malicious party loses MKR in the event of an ES due to their actions. Developing the mechanism for paying people out of the system surplus. An elegant and trustless solution to bug disclosures, patch development and deployment. other MIPs and ideas that don’t “live” anywhere yet.  Thoughts? We can update that thread with links to the discussion threads and actual MIPs as they are created. But the ideas should be collected together somewhere so we can keep track.

Hi @LongForWisdom , Can you tell me if there is a way to un-mute like trustable new members ? Some people that we know , i don’t think they should be muted they could start to contribute right away. Many thanks about your reply Have a great evening !!
Yeah i took one but tl1 is not giving me anything to do this. I send you a private message

Yep, I agree this would be a good idea, but I think it might be good to get more information on the MIP process before building stuff around it. For all I know there is already something in the works that might include a more formal suggestion process. I’ll happily set up and help maintain a thread with that purpose once we know more about the process. Most of this category of thread is already tagged up under ‘idea’ or ‘proposal’ so it shouldn’t be too much trouble rounding them up when the time comes.

I have updated this navigation index to include more of the ‘current affairs’ going on in the governance discussion. I will be attempting to keep this category up to date going forwards. I would love if anyone creating a thread that fits within one of these current affairs could append the appropriate tag. If not, don’t worry, I’ll get to it eventually.
Updated with some of the new tags I am using to track the recent goings on.
Updated this to better reflect category-related tags.
